parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: WorkspaceName
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project name

parameters.name: ShowHelp
parameters.label: Show Help
parameters.description: This will show some help information to help you understand the steps required

content.json:
### Workbook Change Log |Version|Description| |---|---| |v1.2| - Updated Usage Query calculaton from GiB to GB |v1.1| - Added Cost Estimation Tab to predict costs for enabling Basic Logs and data Archiving.
- Added Cost Estimation when updating table plans and Data Archive tiers.
- Added Time Range Selection.
- Added Change Log Notes.
- Fixed Basic Log Table Result Queries.
- Fixed Table Size Queries.|

#### 1. Select a subscription and workspace above.
#### 2. Use the Data Archive, Basic Logs, and Search and Restore Tabs to Navigate
#### 3. Select a table from grid to view and update table retention and plan settings

**Note:** This workbook leverages the Usage table, there may be a delay of **one hour** for newly created tables to appear.

#### Update the relevant base pricing from the [Azure Pricing Calculator](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/calculator/) based on your region.
- Factor in any commitment tiers you may have
- Ensure you have leading zero when using decimals. (0.00)
- Workbook is in USD

**Ingestion Price:** Sentinel + Log Analytics Ingestion Price
- Example: Sentinel Ingestion Price is $2.00, Log Analytics Ingestion Price is $2.30, Total is $4.30. Use 4.30 as the value. 

**Workspace Retention Price:** The Log Analytics Workspace Retention Price

**Workspace Retention Period:** By Default this automatically populate the number of months your workspace retention period is currently set to. You can update this number to see estimated costs for longer retention periods

**Data Archive Price:** The Data Archive Price Per GB based on your region

**Basic Logs Price:** The ingestion price for Basic Logs based on your region

content.title: Update Pricing Based on your Region

parameters.name: IngestionPrice
parameters.label: Ingestion Price
parameters.description: Enter your ingestion price per GB (PAYG or Commitment Tier). (Azure Monitor Ingestion + Sentinel)

parameters.name: basiclogPrice
parameters.label: Basic Logs Price
parameters.description: Enter the Basic Logs Price Per GB based on your region.

parameters.name: ArchivePrice
parameters.label: Data Archive Price
parameters.description: Enter the Data Archive Price Per GB based on your region.

parameters.name: RetentionPrice
parameters.label: Workspace Retention Price
parameters.description: Enter the workspace retention price per GB/month.

parameters.name: workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate
parameters.label: Workspace Retention Period (Months)
parameters.description: The Workspace Retention Period in Months. (Update for an estimate)

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Microsoft Sentinel provides 90 days of data retention for free
You can control your costs by applying a cap to the amount of data that you collect per day

content.json:
Microsoft Sentinel Provides **90 days free** of Data Retention. Update your workspace retention settings. 

[Change the data retention period](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/manage-cost-storage#change-the-data-retention-period)

**Basic Logs**

There are two supported plan types, Analytics and Basic. All tables in your Log Analytics are Analytics tables, by default. 

You can configure particular tables to use **Basic Logs** at reduced priced that have the following limitations:
- Table retention fixed at 8 days
- Alerts are not supported
- Limited KQL language support

You can currently configure the following tables for Basic Logs:

- All tables created with the Data Collection Rule (DCR)-based custom logs API.
- ContainerLog and ContainerLogV2, which Container Insights uses and which include verbose text-based log records.
- AppTraces, which contains freeform log records for application traces in Application Insights.

[More Information on Basic Logs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/log-analytics-workspace-overview?WT.mc_id=modinfra-0000-rotrent#log-data-plans-preview)

[Which tables support Basic Logs?](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/basic-logs-configure?tabs=api-1%2Cportal-1#which-tables-support-basic-logs)

[Sending Custom Logs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview)

**Data Retention and Archive**

Data in each table in a Log Analytics workspace is retained for a specified period of time after which it's either removed or archived with a reduced retention fee. 

- Set the retention time to balance your requirement for having data available with reducing your cost for data retention.

[More Information on Data retention and archive](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-retention-archive)

**Search and Restore**

This tab shows current Search and Restore Tables. For more information on Search and Restore please refer to:

[Search across long time spans in large datasets](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/search-jobs)

[Restore archived logs from search](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/restore)

You may receive a "Could not find column 'TableName' in table 'TableRetentionQuery'" error below, indicating your workspace doesn't currently have any tables that support Basic Plans. 

For more information on what tables support Basic Logs please refer to:

[Which tables support Basic Logs?](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/basic-logs-configure?tabs=api-1%2Cportal-1#which-tables-support-basic-logs)

parameters.name: tablePlanFilter
parameters.label: Filter by Table Plan and Archive Tier

content.title: Select a table below to update settings. (Data is based on the {timeRange:label})

content.query:
Usage
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), size = sum(Quantity) / 1000 by DataType
| project
    ['Table'] = DataType,
    ['Table Size'] = size,
    ['Estimated Ingestion Cost'] = size * iif(IsBillable == false, 0.0, {IngestionPrice}),
    ['Esitmated Workspace Retention Cost'] = size * iif({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} <= 3, 0, ({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} - 3)) * {RetentionPrice},
    IsBillable
| order by Table asc
content.title: Tables Found in the {WorkspaceName} workspace

| project
    ['Table'] = DataType,
    ['Table Size'] = size,
    ['Estimated Workspace Retention Cost'] = size * iif({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} <= 3, 0, ({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} - 3)) * {RetentionPrice},
    IsBillable

content.json:
The below table shows current Workspace Retention and Data Archive Cost Estimates. 

These are only estimates and do not reflect current billed costs. You can use these for planning before enabling Data Archive

Update the **Total Retention in Days** for estimate on Data Archiving. The TotalRetention column reflects the current settings.

content.noDataMessage: It appears your workspace doesn't currently have any tables that support Basic Plans or there are not any archived tables.

content.title: Retention for the {TableName} Table in Days

content.json: You are about to modify the settings of the **{TableName}** table to enable **Archive Logs**. This will modify the **{TableName}** table with a different retention period from the default workspace retntion period of {workspaceRetention} days up to 7 years (2,555 days) > **Note:** Tables will inherit the retention of workspace unless changed. - If a retention is set on a table and the workspace retention is changed, the table retention will not be affected. - To **reset** the table retention to the workspace retention, select the **Reset Retention** button - You can access archived data by running a **search job** or **restoring archived logs** - You can set the workspace default retention policy in the Azure portal to 30, 31, 60, 90, 120, 180, 270, 365, 550, and 730 days.

parameters.name: totalRetentionInDays
parameters.label: Total Retention in Days
parameters.description: The table's total data retention including archive period. Set this property to null if you don't want to archive data.

paramValidationRules.message: Specify the number of days between 1 and 2556

content.json: See the below table on estimated costs - Updating the Total Retention in Days will automatically update estimated costs. - Ensure you have updated your the price paramaters for an accurate estimate. - Leverage the Show Help selector for more informaiton.

armActionContext.title: Caution
Caution

content.query:
Usage
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), size = sum(Quantity) / 1000 by DataType
| where DataType == "{TableName}"
| extend plan = "{TablePlan}"
| project
    ['Table'] = DataType,
    ['Table Plan'] = plan,
    ['Table Size'] = size,
    ['Estimated Ingestion Cost'] = case(plan == "Basic", size * {basiclogPrice}, size * iif(IsBillable == false, 0.0, {IngestionPrice})),
    ['Estimated Workspace Retention Cost'] = size * iif({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} <= 3, 0, ({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} - 3)) * {RetentionPrice},
    ['Estimated Data Archive Cost'] = size * (round(todouble((todouble({totalRetentionInDays})) / 30), 2)) * {ArchivePrice},
    IsBillable
content.title: Estimated  Monthly Costs

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Estimated Ingestion Costs reflect the current Table Plan

content.title: Select the Table Below to Update Plan Settings
content.noDataMessage: Select a Table From the Above Grid

content.json: You are about to modify the settings of the **{TableName}** table to enable **Basic Logs**. This will modify the **{TableName}** table with a fixed retention of **8 days**. The following Sentinel functionality will also be limited - Table retention fixed at 8 days - Alerts are not supported - Limited KQL language support > **Note:** The Table Plan can only be changed once per week [More Information on Basic Logs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/log-analytics-workspace-overview?WT.mc_id=modinfra-0000-rotrent#log-data-plans-preview)

armActionContext.title: Caution

content.json: You are about to modify the settings of the **{TableName}** table to enable **Analytics Logs**. This will modify the **{TableName}** table retention period to the workspace retention period > **Note:** The Table Plan can only be changed once per week [More Information on Analytics Logs](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/log-analytics-workspace-overview?WT.mc_id=modinfra-0000-rotrent#log-data-plans-preview)

armActionContext.title: Caution

content.json:
It appears your workspace doesn't currently have any tables that support Basic Plans or You have not selected a table above.

For more information on what tables support Basic Logs please refer to:

[Which tables support Basic Logs?](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/basic-logs-configure?tabs=api-1%2Cportal-1#which-tables-support-basic-logs)
See the below table on estimated costs - Ensure you have updated your the price paramaters for an accurate estimate. - Leverage the Show Help selector for more informaiton.

content.query:
Usage
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), size = sum(Quantity) / 1000 by DataType
| where DataType == "{TableName}"
| extend plan = "{TablePlan}"
| project
    ['Table'] = DataType,
    ['Table Plan'] = plan,
    ['Table Size'] = size,
    ['Estimated Ingestion Cost'] = size * iif(IsBillable = false, 0.0, {IngestionPrice}),
    ['Estimated Basic Logs Cost'] = size * {basiclogPrice},
    IsBillable
content.title: Estimated  Monthly Costs
content.noDataMessage: The query didn't return any results. The table may not have any billed data yet.

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Reflects the Analytics Plan Estimated Costs

content.title: Select a Search or Restore Table to Update Settings

content.json: You are about to modify the settings of the **{srchrstTableName}** table This will modify the **{srchrstTableName}** table with a different retention period from the default workspace retention period of {workspaceRetention} days up to 7 years (2,555 days) > **Note:** Tables will inherit the retention of workspace unless changed. - If a retention is set on a table and the workspace retention is changed, the table retention will not be affected. - To **reset** the table retention to the workspace retention, select the **Reset Retention** button - To **delete** the table, select the **Delete Table** button - You can access archived data by running a **search job** or **restoring archived logs** - You can set the workspace default retention policy in the Azure portal to 30, 31, 60, 90, 120, 180, 270, 365, 550, and 730 days.

parameters.name: totalRetentionInDays
parameters.label: Total Retention in Days
parameters.description: The table's total data retention including archive period. Set this property to null if you don't want to archive data.

paramValidationRules.message: Specify the number of days between 1 and 2556

content.json: See the below table on estimated costs - Updating the Total Retention in Days will automatically update estimated costs. - Ensure you have updated your the price paramaters for an accurate estimate. - Leverage the Show Help selector for more informaiton.

armActionContext.title: Caution
Caution
Warning

content.query:
{srchrstTableName}
| where TimeGenerated >= ago({workspaceRetention}d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), size = sum(_BilledSize) by Type
| extend plan = "{srchrstTablePlan}"
| project 
    ['Table'] = Type, 
    ['Table Plan'] = plan,
    ['Table Size'] = size,
    ['Estimated Workspace Retention Cost'] = (size/(1000*1000*1000)) * iif({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} <= 3, 0, ({workspaceRetentionPeriod_estimate} - 3)) * {RetentionPrice},
    ['Estimated Data Archive Cost'] = (size/(1000*1000*1000)) * (round(todouble((todouble({totalRetentionInDays})) / 30), 2)) * {ArchivePrice},
    ['IsBillable'] = _IsBillable
content.title: Estimated  Monthly Costs

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Estimated Ingestion Costs reflect the current Table Plan
